smells.name: LongMethod
smells.description: One method should have one responsibility. Long methods tend to handle many things at once. Prefer smaller methods to make them easier to understand.

instances.message: The function testHardcodedSensor is too long. The maximum length is 20.
The function onCreate is too long. The maximum length is 20.
The function configureParticleHistory is too long. The maximum length is 20.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Object 'CheckUtility' with '14' functions detected. Defined threshold inside objects is set to '11'

smells.name: MethodOverloading
smells.description: Methods which are overloaded often might be harder to maintain. Furthermore, these methods are tightly coupled. Refactor these methods and try to use optional parameters.

smells.name: WildcardImport

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in ("#/0.1L") are unnecessary and can be replaced with: "#/0.1L"
Parentheses in ("\\.") are unnecessary and can be replaced with: "\\."
Parentheses in ("\\.") are unnecessary and can be replaced with: "\\."
Parentheses in ("\"|") are unnecessary and can be replaced with: "\"|"
Parentheses in ("") are unnecessary and can be replaced with: ""
Parentheses in (mPrefs.getString("sync_mod", "2")) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: mPrefs.getString("sync_mod", "2")
Parentheses in (mPrefs.getString("sync_frequency", "60")) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: mPrefs.getString("sync_frequency", "60")
Parentheses in (mPrefs.getString("sync_mod", "2")) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: mPrefs.getString("sync_mod", "2")
Parentheses in (mPrefs.getString("sync_frequency", "60")) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: mPrefs.getString("sync_frequency", "60")
Parentheses in (Device::class) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: Device::class
Parentheses in (TimestampSync::class) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: TimestampSync::class
Parentheses in (mPrefs.getString("sync_type", "2")) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: mPrefs.getString("sync_type", "2")
Parentheses in (mPrefs.getString("collect_data_frequency", "1")) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: mPrefs.getString("collect_data_frequency", "1")
Parentheses in (mPrefs.getString("collect_data_frequency", "1")) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: mPrefs.getString("collect_data_frequency", "1")

smells.name: UnusedImports
smells.description: Unused Imports are dead code and should be removed.

instances.message: The import 'ch.hsr.geohash.GeoHash' is unused.
The import 'android.app.Activity' is unused.
The import 'android.arch.lifecycle.ViewModelProviders' is unused.
The import 'android.support.annotation.RequiresApi' is unused.
The import 'android.util.Log' is unused.
The import 'org.w3c.dom.Text' is unused.
The import 'science.apolline.service.database.AppDatabase' is unused.
The import 'java.lang.ref.WeakReference' is unused.
The import 'android.content.Context' is unused.
The import 'android.widget.TextView' is unused.
The import 'science.apolline.ApollineApplication' is unused.
The import 'android.widget.Toast' is unused.
The import 'science.apolline.models.IOIOData' is unused.

smells.name: ProtectedMemberInFinalClass
smells.description: Member with protected visibility in final class is private. Consider using private or internal as modifier.

instances.message: Member with protected visibility in final class is private. Consider using private or internal as modifier.
Member with protected visibility in final class is private. Consider using private or internal as modifier.

smells.name: MayBeConst
smells.description: Reports vals that can be const val instead.

instances.message: EXTRAS_DEVICE_NAME can be a `const val`.
EXTRAS_DEVICE_ADDRESS can be a `const val`.
TAG can be a `const val`.
DAY_IN_MILLIS can be a `const val`.
TO_MILLIS can be a `const val`.
TAG can be a `const val`.
ACTION_GATT_CONNECTED can be a `const val`.
ACTION_GATT_DISCONNECTED can be a `const val`.
ACTION_GATT_SERVICES_DISCOVERED can be a `const val`.
ACTION_DATA_AVAILABLE can be a `const val`.
EXTRA_DATA can be a `const val`.

smells.name: RedundantVisibilityModifierRule
smells.description: Checks for redundant visibility modifiers. Public is the default visibility for classes. The public modifier is redundant.

instances.message: IOIO_REGEX is explicitly marked as public. Properties are public by default so this modifier is redundant.
APPA_REGEX is explicitly marked as public. Properties are public by default so this modifier is redundant.
sensor_name is explicitly marked as public. Properties are public by default so this modifier is redundant.

smells.name: CollapsibleIfStatements
smells.description: Two if statements which could be collapsed were detected. These statements can be merged to improve readability.

instances.message: Two if statements which could be collapsed were detected. These statements can be merged to improve readability.
Two if statements which could be collapsed were detected. These statements can be merged to improve readability.

smells.name: PreferToOverPairSyntax
smells.description: Pair was created using the Pair constructor, using the to syntax is preferred.

instances.message: Pair is created by using the pair constructor. This can replaced by `currentLocation to currentActivity`
Pair is created by using the pair constructor. This can replaced by `currentLocation to currentActivity`
